price: 87. Longola sé mawa kowuta epai ya Nkolo wayo. Ya sólo, bolamu bwaye epai nayo ezali ebele.
arabic: إِلَّا رَحۡمَةٗ مِّن رَّبِّكَۚ إِنَّ فَضۡلَهُۥ كَانَ عَلَيۡكَ كَبِيرٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: illā raḥmatan min rabbika inna faḍlahu kāna ʿalayka kabīran
